TrajConserve: Trajectory Conservation Analysis Tools for Single-Cell Data

Source: R/trajConserve-package.R
trajConserve.Rd

Tools for analyzing trajectory conservation in single-cell data. This package provides functions for Bayesian GAM regression modeling of expression trajectories, pseudotime binning and transformation, and visualization of trajectory models.

Key Functions

  • seurat_to_trajectory_array - Convert Seurat object to a 3D trajectory array

  • bayesian_gam_regression_nb_shape - Fit Bayesian GAM regression model

  • run_multiple_models - Run models for multiple genes in parallel

  • plot_results_brms - Visualize model results

See also
